title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 160.12 - Open sources of ignition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 160.12 - Open sources of ignition

State Regulations
(a) In order to
ensure that products or chemicals are not inadvertently ignited, open sources
of ignition, flame or sparks, including candles, gas burners and cigarettes, are prohibited. Owners, managers and individual operators shall be responsible
for such compliance. (b) Owners may
designate a smoking area for employees and clients. However, such designated
area must be separated from the operational areas of the premises and be
properly ventilated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
160.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
